items.title: Braden Smith takes accountability in Purdue basketball's 'eye-opener' at Kentucky
items.snippet: Coach Matt Painter said he wasn't worried offensively but the same wasn't true defensively. Plus a look guard and center players from the game at Kentucky.

items.title: Purdue’s Matt Painter regrets not talking about an NCAA title last year. This season, it’s different
items.snippet: Matt Painter believes one of his mistakes last year was not talking about playing for the title enough.

items.title: 5 risers in Kentucky’s impressive exhibition victory over No. 1 Purdue
items.snippet: Who impressed in the Wildcats' surging win over #1 Purdue? We’re glad you asked!
